passages.text:
You find yourself in your small room in the town inn.
[[Inn Bar]]
passages.name: Inn Room

passages.text:
You are in the inn bar filled with all sorts of people drinking and singing.
[[Inn Room]]
[[Town Square]]
[[Side Door]]
passages.name: Inn Bar

passages.text:
You are in the town square surrounded by shops. In the center is a large fountain. In front of you is a temple fronted by the goddess Melora.
[[Inn Bar]] 
[[Blacksmith]]
[[Belethor's General Goods]]
[[Temple of Melora]]
passages.name: Town Square

passages.text:
You enter the Blacksmith, but quickly realize you have no gold and no idea how to make a combat system in Twine.
[[Town Square]]
passages.name: Blacksmith

passages.text:
You enter the Temple of Melora. A hooded priest bows to you as you enter. In front of you, there are rows of pews and a shrine to the goddess.
[[Shrine]]
[[Town Square]]
passages.name: Temple of Melora

passages.text:
You enter Belethor's General Goods. You see books, potions, leather puches, and many other various goods scattered around the shop. You also see Belethor, looking at you impatiently.
[[Town Square]]
passages.name: Belethor's General Goods

passages.text:
You approach the shrine and feel a calm come over you as you look into it.
[[Town Square]]
passages.name: Shrine

passages.text:
You enter a closet filled with kegs and cleaning supplies.
[[Inn Bar]]
passages.name: Side Door
